items.title: Stock market holiday today: BSE, NSE to remain shut for Christmas
items.description: Trading in derivatives, equities, SLBs, currency derivatives, and interest rate derivatives will remain shut for the day.

items.title: Chartist Talks: Gemstone's Milan Vaishnav picks these 2 Nifty stocks for 2025
items.description: While Tata Motors remains in a continuing downtrend, it has shown initial signs of a potential bottom formation, said Milan Vaishnav.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Paytm, Coal India, HPCL, Uno Minda, Amber Enterprises, Oberoi Realty, and others on December 26?
items.description: The market is expected to attempt an upward movement amid likely consolidation. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.
